mapper.select: SELECT MAIN_MENU_NAME mainMenuName, MAIN_MENU_PAGE mainMenuPage, SUB_MENU_NAME subMenuName, SUB_MENU_PAGE subMenuPage FROM SUB_MENU JOIN MAIN_MENU ON(SUB_MAIN_MENU = MAIN_MENU_PAGE)

SELECT MOVIE_THEATHER, SUBSTR(MOVIE_SCREENING_DATE,6,5) AS SCREENING_DATE, SUBSTR(MOVIE_SCREENING_DATE,12,5) AS SCREENING_TIME, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_PRICE FROM MOVIE_SCREENING_PRICE ORDER BY MOVIE_SCREENING_DATE
